summary: The story of our growing awareness and understanding of the environmental crisis and emergence, during the 1960's and '70's, of popular movement to confront it.
cast: Stewart Brand|Rachel L. Carson|Bill Clinton|Paul Ehrlich|Denis Hayes|John F. Kennedy|Hunter Lovins|Pete McCloskey|Dennis Meadows|Stephanie Mills|Gaylord Nelson|Russell Schweickart|Stewart L. Udall
title: Earth Days
